title: La Vaca
subtitle: The Cow
meta_desc: Learn cow vocabulary in Spanish (vaca, leche, grande, mancha) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, Spanish animals book, la vaca Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids

pages.title: La Vaca
